rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C190940

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 Item Test Code Terminology

name: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 Item Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Little interest or pleasure in doing things.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-8 - Little Interest or Pleasure in Things

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Feeling down, depressed, or hopeless.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-8 - Feeling Down Depressed or Hopeless

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-8 - Trouble Falling or Staying Asleep

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Feeling tired or having little energy.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-8 - Feeling Tired or Little Energy

terms.definition: Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Poor appetite or overeating.

Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Feeling bad about yourself--or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down.

Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television.

Patient Health Questionnaire - 8 - Over the past 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems? Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite -- being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual.
terms.preferredTerm: PHQ-8 - Moving Slowly or Fidgety or Restless
